body_text: If you're only using one sub-reducer here, you can probably return items directly. Alternatively, rejected_experiment might make sense as a separate sub-reducer.
body: If you're only using one sub-reducer here, you can probably return `items` directly. Alternatively, `rejected_experiment` might make sense as a separate sub-reducer.
body_html: If you're only using one sub-reducer here, you can probably return items directly. Alternatively, rejected_experiment might make sense as a separate sub-reducer.
